DOC.detailed_description: The investigator plan conduct clinic-based interventional study 50 patient follow Miriam Hospital Kidney Stone Clinic history nephrolithiasis , urinary calcium excretion 150 400 mg/day , 25-vitamin D deficiency/insufficiency ( defined serum level ≤ 30ng/ml ) . The intervention oral ergocalciferol 50,000 IU per week 12 week ( repletion course ) . After , repletion course repeat serum 25-vitamin D remain ≤ 30ng/ml drop ≤ 30ng/ml anytime study . Otherwise , maintenance dose cholecalciferol 1,000 IU daily ergocalciferol 50,000 IU monthly prescribe rest study . Each participant serve control . The outcome change urinary calcium excretion stone burden assess renal ultrasound . The plan study duration 12 month . The investigator great 95 % power detect 10 % increase 24-hour urinary calcium .
